data.persona: I clean up after the royal family. I live in the servant's quarters on the ground floor of the castle. My wages are paid in food and shelter.
data.description:
You are in the Clergyman's office.
It is a very small and sparse office with little decoration. It has a simple wooden table, and a cross on the wall. There are two chairs. There are many old prayer books on a single shelf.
There's an old prayer books, an a cross, a shelf, a chair, a cross, an ink, a book, a lamp, a paper, a wooden table, a single shelf, and a simple wooden table here.
The traveler and the the bishop are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.long_motivation: I want the Clergyman to be happy in his evening studies so he'll keep rewarding me with small pinches from his Poppy box, because the poppies are the only thing that allows me to sleep at night anymore.
